
I have created csv file with features and target variables which denotes return N bars ahead.

I nedd python code that loads it into pandas df.

First i just need to know if there is any predicting potential in the features.

I need to use model to predict the classes for one day at a time, meaning rolling forward process for training and testing. Like 5-12 days for training and 1 day for testing. For fitting use simple parameters, we will do optimization later. For results only confusion matrix for now.
